author: Diana Bruk
title: Cher's Savage Tweet In Response To Donald Trump "Fine-Tuned Machine" Quote
text:
THE DOG ATE TRUMPS INAUGURAL CROWD 藍 
— Cher (@cher) January 21, 2017 Most Popular DONTFOOLED BY TRUMP’S SHINY(THE DOG ATE MY POPULAR VOTE)TOY‼️GOP WET DREAM HAS ALWAYS BEEN2 EXPAND VOTER SUPPRESSION (OF BLK & LATINO)LAWS trump is a thug,He talks & Acts like a thug.Hes like a low Class" DonCorleone"without Emotions On Friday, Cher responded to the moment during Trump's incendiary press conference when he said, "this administration is running like a fine-tuned machine" with this gem: Says "his administration is running like a fine tuned machine".Yes....a Garbage Disposal President Trump is notorious for clapping back at his Twitter opponents, but so far he has kept his reaction to himself.
